articles.title: Real Madrid explain the bad state of the Bernabeu pitch, but won't change it - Marca English
articles.description: Real Madrid beat RB Leipzig 2-0 in their second Champions League group match on Wednesday night, however the game was blemished by the poor state of the new Estadio Santiago Bernab
articles.content:
Real Madrid beat RB Leipzig 2-0 in their second Champions League group match on Wednesday night, however the game was blemished by the poor state of the new Estadio Santiago Bernabeu pitch.
It was a… [+2011 chars]
